ECSA Best Paper Award to research collaboration between STLab and S2Group

Posted on September 6, 2024

The paper titled “Architectural Views: The State of Practice in Open-Source Software Projects”, based on the STLab master thesis of Sofia Migliorini, has been awarded with the Best Paper award at the 18th European Conference on Software Architecture (ECSA, Rank A). [Read More]
Tags: award

STLab research recipient of best presentation award at EPEW'24

Posted on August 7, 2024

The research titled “Approximation of First Passage Distributions in Markov Chains with Replicated Components”, authored by András Horváth (UniTO), Marco Paolieri (USC), and Enrico Vicario (STLab) was awarded with the best presentation award at the 20th European Performance Engineering Workshop (EPEW’24). [Read More]
Tags: award

STLab wins Best Poster awards at Restart Plenary Meeting

Posted on January 29, 2024

STLab lands a double score at Restart Plenary Meeting, held in Bologna this January, winning both the il “Best Poster” and “Best Poster Runner–up” awards [Read More]
Tags: award

Closing the curtains on ISSRE'23 hosted in Florence

Posted on October 17, 2023

We are delighted to announce that, as of the 12th October 2023, the 34th IEEE International Symposium on Software Reliability Engineering (ISSRE) has concluded in Florence, Italy. [Read More]

STLAB Assistant Professor Interviewed by New York Times on Green AI

Posted on October 16, 2023

Roberto Verdecchia, assistant professor of the STLAB, was recently interviewed by the New York Times on the environmental sustainability of AI, also simply referred to as “Green AI”. [Read More]
